Summary.inferences:
• The total support hours from May'25-Jan'26 is 590.5, where the highest hours were in September(147 hrs) with the most hours(67 hrs) being used in CR/ Enhancement and the other hours(34 hrs) being utilised in R&D followed by the second highest in the month of October(108 hours) with the most hours(47.5 hrs) being used in R&D and the other hours(36.5) being used in CR/Enhancement. October amounted for reduced hours since the fixes were applied. 
 • January amounted for the least hours(25 hours).
 • The highest hours for Issues/Bug was in Nov(43 hrs)
 • The Highest Effort Hours(67 hours) for CR/Enhancement was in the month of Sept.

cbs changes.inferences:
•  CBS-related changes were highest in the Month of September(67 hours), followed with the the second highest in the month of October(36.5 hours)
• There was a 54% drop in the effort hours in October from September after the apply of the fixes.
• No CBS activity recorded in the month of May, June ,November and December and January.
• Regular Maintenance consumed the highest hours(255 hrs) on month on month basis

Master.inferences:
• Regular Maintenance is the largest category, making up ~45% of total effort.
• Issue/Bug resolution shows seasonal spikes.
